title: Jagex Launcher

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Jagex Launcher is an official game launcher for Old School RuneScape and RuneScape. It was launched on 14 March 2022 through an open beta.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Jagex Launcher
The main menu of the Jagex Launcher

The Jagex Launcher is an official game launcher for Old School RuneScape and RuneScape. It was launched on 14 March 2022 through an open beta.

Currently, it is only available for Microsoft Windows users to install, with support for macOS being available in the near future, alongside with the option to install and play via RuneLite.

Contents

  • 1 Game clients
  • 2 Account information
  • 3 Links in the launcher
  • 4 Settings
  • 5 Changes
  • 6 See also
  • 7 External links

Game clients[edit | edit source]

The launcher can locate and launch existing game clients installed on the same system, or it can be used to install the clients if they are not found.

Account information[edit | edit source]

To use the launcher, the player must first log in with their Jagex account. The account information is passed onto the opened game so that they don't need to re-enter their credentials once they open the client.

Unless the user logs out from the launcher, the account information is also saved in the launcher for 30 days after the last usage of the launcher, streamlining the process of re-entering the games.

Links in the launcher[edit | edit source]

The following links can be found in the launcher's main interface:

  • Shop pages for both games
  • Main websites for both games
  • Latest four news articles for both games
  • List of news articles for both games
  • Feedback form for the launcher

The following can be found in the settings interface:

  • Account settings
  • Terms and Conditions
  • Privacy Policy
  • EULA
  • Cookies Policy
  • Rules of RuneScape
  • What's New?

Settings[edit | edit source]

The launcher's language is customisable. The languages offered are English, German, French, and Portuguese.

It is also possible to toggle whether the launcher is opened upon starting up the operating system or not.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
6 April 2022
  • Future self-updates to the launcher require 80% less data to be downloaded.
  • When failing to launch the game, more context and instructions are given in the error message.
21 March 2022

A link to the release notes has been added to the Settings menu.

See also[edit | edit source]

  • Update:Jagex Launcher Open Beta - Live Now

External links[edit | edit source]

  • Official Launcher download website
  • Jagex Launcher FAQ

rawContent:
{{external|rs}}
[[File:Jagex Launcher main menu.png|thumb|The main menu of the Jagex Launcher]]
The '''Jagex Launcher''' is an official game launcher for ''[[Old School RuneScape]]'' and ''{{RSL|RuneScape}}''. It was launched on [[14 March]] [[2022]] through an open beta.

Currently, it is only available for {{wp|Microsoft Windows}} users to install, with support for {{wp|macOS}} being available in the near future, alongside with the option to install and play via [[RuneLite]].

==Game clients==
The launcher can locate and launch existing game clients installed on the same system, or it can be used to install the clients if they are not found.

==Account information==
To use the launcher, the player must first log in with their [[Jagex]] account. The account information is passed onto the opened game so that they don't need to re-enter their credentials once they open the client.

Unless the user logs out from the launcher, the account information is also saved in the launcher for 30 days after the last usage of the launcher, streamlining the process of re-entering the games.

==Links in the launcher==
The following links can be found in the launcher's main interface:
* Shop pages for both games
* Main websites for both games
* Latest four news articles for both games
* List of news articles for both games
* Feedback form for the launcher

The following can be found in the settings interface:
* [https://www.runescape.com/account_settings Account settings]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/terms Terms and Conditions]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/terms/privacy Privacy Policy]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/terms/eula EULA]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/terms/cookies Cookies Policy]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/terms/rules-of-runescape Rules of RuneScape]
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/launcher/release-notes What's New?]

==Settings==
The launcher's language is customisable. The languages offered are English, German, French, and Portuguese.

It is also possible to toggle whether the launcher is opened upon starting up the operating system or not.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 6 April 2022
|change = 
* Future self-updates to the launcher require 80% less data to be downloaded.
* When failing to launch the game, more context and instructions are given in the error message.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 21 March 2022
|change = A link to the [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/launcher/release-notes release notes] has been added to the Settings menu.
}}
{{Subject changes footer}}

==See also==
* [[Update:Jagex Launcher Open Beta - Live Now]]

==External links==
* [https://www.jagex.com/en-GB/launcher Official Launcher download website]
* [https://support.runescape.com/hc/en-gb/articles/4431227961489 Jagex Launcher FAQ]
